1.title: Cops on the Rocks
1.plot: Mike and Carl break up. Molly does an interview for NPR.

2.title: One Small Step for Mike
2.plot: Molly hopes that a fitness device will encourage Mike to be more active and take better care of himself, but Mike has other plans for it.

3.title: Peg O' My Heart Attack
3.plot: Mike blames Molly for his mom's heart attack following a heated argument, and now Molly wants to make amends.

4.title: Super Cop
4.plot: Mike becomes hyper-vigilant after his wallet is stolen from the squad car while taking a nap.

5.title: Joyce's Will Be Done
5.plot: Molly is shocked when Joyce revels that she's leaving the house to Victoria in her will.

6.title: The Good Wife
6.plot: Molly's leisure activities between novels become an issue with Mike, as he wants her to be the perfect homemaker.

7.title: Weekend with Birdie
7.plot: Mike brings home a stray puppy for the weekend, but Molly has difficulty warming up to it.

8.title: The Wreck of the Vincent Moranto
8.plot: Mike is upset and disappointed when Vince bails on finishing a do-it-yourself project they started together.

9.title: Baby, Please Don't Go
9.plot: Molly meets up with a former student who is pregnant and living on the street, so she invited her home.

10.title: Baby Bump
10.plot: A determined Molly decides to help Frannie connect her with her estranged sister after she and Mike discover that there are no plans in store for the baby.

11.title: The Adoption Option
11.plot: Mike and Molly need everyone to be on their best behavior when the adoption agency schedules a home visit.

12.title: Curse of the Bambino
12.plot: Mike and Molly drive the family crazy while anxiously awaiting word from the adoption agency on whether or not they'll receive a baby.

13.title: I See Love
13.plot: Mike and Molly gather with family and friends for a momentous occasion and reminisce about everything that led to this point.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: When teacher Molly Flynn hears Officer Mike Biggs' "share" at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting, she's instantly smitten and invites him to come speak to her fourth grade class.

2.title: First Date
2.plot: When Molly gets a cold before her first date with Mike, she takes some cold medication to help her feel better - with disastrous results.

3.title: First Kiss
3.plot: Mike gets his ego hurt during a bowling date with Molly.

4.title: Mike's Not Ready
4.plot: Mike and Molly get their signals crossed when she invites him in after a date and he turns her down.

5.title: Carl Is Jealous
5.plot: Mike invites Carl on a double date when Carl becomes jealous of the time Mike is spending with Molly.

6.title: Mike's Apartment
6.plot: When Mike invites Molly over to his apartment, his plans for romance are interrupted by an untimely call from his mom, Peggy.

7.title: After the Lovin'
7.plot: Mike comes on too strong after spending the weekend with Molly, and takes Carl's advice to play it cool.

8.title: Mike Snores
8.plot: Molly gets annoyed when she spends all of her time at Mike's apartment, and insists he spend a night at her place.

9.title: Mike's New Boots
9.plot: Molly becomes jealous when Mike introduces her as his "friend" to a woman who is clearly flirting with him.

10.title: Molly Gets a Hat
10.plot: When Mike's overbearing mother buys Molly a new hat as a gesture of goodwill, Molly feels obliged to invite her to spend Thanksgiving with her family.

11.title: Carl Gets a Girl
11.plot: When Carl borrows Mike's apartment for a date, Mike spends more time at Molly's house and ends up bonding with her mom and sister.

12.title: First Christmas
12.plot: Mike has no idea what to buy Molly for their first Christmas together.

13.title: Mike Goes to the Opera
13.plot: When Mike falls ill during a night out with Molly at the opera, Mike's mom and Molly clash over who can take better care of him.

14.title: Molly Makes Soup
14.plot: When Vince tries to strike up a friendship with Mike by inviting him to a big basketball game, Molly isn't pleased with their newfound bond.

15.title: Jim Won't Eat
15.plot: When Mike's mom, Peggy, needs gallbladder surgery, she shocks Molly by asking her to take care of her dog. Meanwhile, Molly is thrown when Mike starts talking about being buried next to her when he dies.

16.title: First Valentine's Day
16.plot: Mike's big plans for his first Valentine's Day with Molly are thrown into jeopardy after he accidentally runs into Molly's ex-boyfriend.

17.title: Joyce & Vince and Peaches & Herb
17.plot: When Mike decides that the couch is his new best friend, Molly goes out on the town with her sister, Victoria.

18.title: Mike's Feet
18.plot: Mike and Carl get on each other's nerves after working too many double shifts together during a snowstorm.

19.title: Peggy Shaves Her Legs
19.plot: When Peggy and Molly have lunch together, Mike worries that his mom is telling Molly unflattering stories about his childhood.

20.title: Opening Day
20.plot: Mike breaks tradition and invites Molly to join him and Carl at opening day for the Chicago Cubs.

21.title: Samuel Gets Fired
21.plot: Thanks to Carl's interference, Samuel loses his job at the diner and his apartment also. Mike then offers him shelter in the meantime.

22.title: Cigar Talk
22.plot: When Joyce invites Vince to attend her high school reunion, Vince confesses to Mike that he never graduated high school, and convinces Mike to help him study for his GED.

23.title: Victoria's Birthday
23.plot: Victoria panics as her 30th birthday approaches, and drags Mike and Molly into her "life crisis."

24.title: Peggy's New Beau
24.plot: Mike feels pressured when Peggy's new boyfriend asks whether he and Molly hear wedding bells in their future.

1.title: Goin' Fishin'
1.plot: Mike and Molly are happy to be engaged but, where Molly's about planning the ceremony, Mike's all about the wedding night. This causes a rift that sends Mike and the guys off on a fishing trip.

2.title: Dennis's Birthday
2.plot: Mike's mom, Peggy, is in for a big surprise when she celebrates her boyfriend Dennis's birthday.

3.title: Mike in the House
3.plot: When Mike moves in with Molly and her family, he has to adjust from life in his bachelor pad to a house full of women.

4.title: '57 Chevy Bel Air
4.plot: Molly wants to save money for their wedding, but Mike is lured into buying Vince's 1957 Chevy Bel Air.

5.title: Victoria Runs Away
5.plot: Despite Mike's good intentions, he adds fuel to the fire when Molly and her family get in a fight.

6.title: Happy Halloween
6.plot: Mike's spooked when Molly's boss invites them to a party on Halloween, a holiday he dreads.

7.title: Carl Meets a Lady
7.plot: Carl tries to get a date with an attractive woman he meets at the diner.

8.title: Peggy Gets a Job
8.plot: When Mike encourages his mom, Peggy, to get a job, he never imagines how it will interfere with Molly's life.

9.title: Mike Cheats
9.plot: Mike cheats on his diet and gets caught.

10.title: Molly Needs a Number
10.plot: When Molly is swamped with wedding planning, she asks Mike to help, with mixed results.

11.title: Christmas Break
11.plot: When Molly gets disappointing news at work, she is thrown into a funk that threatens to ruin Christmas.

12.title: Carl Has Issues
12.plot: Carl is confronted with his fear of commitment when he and Christina attempt to take their relationship to the next level.

13.title: Victoria Can't Drive
13.plot: When Victoria is arrested for various driving violations, Molly and Joyce ask Mike to help spring her from jail.

14.title: Joyce's Choices
14.plot: Joyce drives Vince crazy with jealousy when she agrees to have dinner with her ex-boyfriend.

15.title: Valentine's Piggyback
15.plot: When Mike fails to make Valentine's Day dinner reservations, he persuades Carl to share the reservations that Carl made for Christina. On their way to the restaurant, Mike and Carl must talk a suicidal man down off a ledge.

16.title: Surprise
16.plot: When Molly learns that Mike hasn't had a birthday party since he was 9 years old, she decides to throw him a surprise party. Meanwhile, Samuel dates a girl he met through an online dating service.

17.title: Mike Likes Lasagna
17.plot: Mike is worried when Molly suggests that they write their own wedding vows, until Carl tells him to write vows like he's describing how much he loves lasagna.

18.title: Peggy Goes to Branson
18.plot: When Peggy goes out of town, she leaves her beloved dog, Jim, with Mike and Molly, telling them it will be good practice for having children.

19.title: Molly Can't Lie
19.plot: When Mike and Molly meet with the priest at Peggy's church, Molly's outspoken and forthright nature winds up costing them their wedding chapel.

20.title: The Dress
20.plot: With three weeks to go before the big day, Molly discovers that her wedding dress is too tight during her final fitting. Putting her dieting into overdrive, Molly's about to have a meltdown.

21.title: Bachelor/Bachelorette
21.plot: When Mike's dad comes to town early for his son's bachelor party, Peggy decides she should attend Molly's bachelorette bash - and proceeds to turn it into a raucous affair.

22.title: The Rehearsal
22.plot: With only two days to go before the big day, Mike and Molly stage their wedding rehearsal - with disastrous results when it's upended by their family and friends.

23.title: The Wedding
23.plot: Chaos ensues on Mike & Molly's wedding day as anything that can go wrong, does in the second season finale. Watch as they finally make their trip down the aisle and tie the knot.

1.title: The Honeymoon Is Over
1.plot: Mike is inspired by their honeymoon trip to Paris to change his life and travel the world, while Molly worries how their family and friends fared at home without them.

2.title: Vince Takes a Bath
2.plot: When Vince throws out his back, Joyce conveniently disappears, leaving Mike and Molly to care for him. Meanwhile, the newlyweds struggle to write personalized thank-you notes for their wedding gifts.

3.title: Mike Likes Cake
3.plot: Molly is frustrated when she realizes Mike has a weird face on each of their wedding photos. Carl is worried when Christina's ex-husband shows up.

4.title: Molly in the Middle
4.plot: Mike and Molly decide the time is right for them to start trying for a baby. Meanwhile, Carl gets upset when he learns that Molly is still spending time with Christina after their breakup.

5.title: Mike's Boss
5.plot: Mike is forced to set up his mom with his boss, despite his many reservations.

6.title: Yard Sale
6.plot: With the house feeling too cramped and crowded, Molly plans a family yard sale. Meanwhile, Mike and the guys take Carl on a fishing trip to help him forget his breakup with Christina.

7.title: Thanksgiving Is Canceled
7.plot: When Mike gets sick for Thanksgiving, Molly is secretly thrilled because she won't have to cook... until Vince invites his brother, Frankie (guest star JON POLITO), to town for a homemade Thanksgiving meal.

8.title: Mike Likes Briefs
8.plot: When Mike gets nervous after Molly doesn't get pregnant following weeks of trying, he turns to Carl and Samuel for advice.

9.title: Mike Takes a Test
9.plot: Molly encourages Mike to pursue a detective position on the force, but the stress of taking the qualification exam starts to take a big toll on their relationship.

10.title: Karaoke Christmas
10.plot: Mike dresses as Santa, but feels more like the Grinch when he can't contain his frustrations over Molly's Christmas spending.

11.title: Fish for Breakfast
11.plot: In an effort to boost their chances of getting pregnant, Molly encourages Mike to join her in giving up caffeine and eating healthier, causing them both to have major withdrawals.

12.title: Molly's Birthday
12.plot: Mike prepares to spoil Molly for her birthday, but his plans go awry after he eats psychadelic gelato made by Victoria's friend, Tom (guest star DAVE "GRUBER" ALLEN), and goes on an unexpected trip.

13.title: Carl Gets a Roommate
13.plot: Mike begins transforming the basement into a living area for he and Molly to live in, but the construction work is more than he - or his eyebrows - can handle! Meanwhile, Carl invites Samuel to move in with him.

14.title: The Princess and the Troll
14.plot: Mike and Molly encourage Harry to take Victoria on a date for Valentine's Day, and everyone is shocked when she accepts. Meanwhile, Carl convinces Samuel that they will be able to meet women at the laundromat during the holiday.

15.title: Mike the Tease
15.plot: Mike studies male fertility and visits a clinic to ensure that his "swimmers" are up to the task of starting a family with Molly. Meanwhile, Vince gets a new job selling vacuum cleaners door-to-door.

16.title: Molly's New Shoes
16.plot: Molly enjoys some retail therapy and goes off on a shopping spree after Mike storms off over a disagreement and disappears at the mall.

17.title: St. Patrick's Day
17.plot: Carl and Samuel host a St. Patrick's Day party in hopes of attracting some lucky ladies. Meanwhile, Molly reveals juicy secrets from her previous St. Patrick's Day excursions to Mike.

18.title: Spring Break
18.plot: Molly joins her sister on a Spring Break road trip to party with Victoria's friends from junior college, while Mike pulls some strings with his boss for some overtime assignments.

19.title: Party Planners
19.plot: Even though Mike's birthday wish is to have his wife and mother get along, Molly and Peggy can't seem to play nice as they try to plan his birthday party together. Meanwhile, Carl and Samuel compete for the same woman.

20.title: Mike Can't Read
20.plot: After learning that Joyce gave up her artistic talents when she became a mother, Molly decides that she and Mike need to pursue new hobbies before becoming parents. Consequently, Molly encourages Mike to take up roller-skating with her!

21.title: Molly's Out of Town
21.plot: Mike goes on a junk food binge to cope with missing Molly, while she's out of twon for a teacher's conference. Meanwhile, Carl contemplates leaving Chicago after learning heartbreaking news from James (guest star LAMONICA GARRETT).

22.title: School Recital
22.plot: Molly is so focused on directing a school recital that she doesn't realize a fellow teacher is hitting on her. Meanwhile, Vince convinces Mike to join him in an unusual money-making scheme. TIM CONWAY and JIM BEAVER guest star.

23.title: Windy City
23.plot: In the third season finale, Mike and Carl get stuck working at the Renaissance Faire after their boss, Captain Murphy, gets dumped by Mike's mother. Later, as a tornado descends on Chicago, Mike and Molly each confess important news to each other.

1.title: Molly Unleashed
1.plot: Molly finds herself at a crossroads with her career and makes a huge decision to give up her job teaching elementary school to follow her dreams.

2.title: The First and Last Ride-Along
2.plot: Molly decides writing a crime novel will be her new career, so she goes on a ride-along with Mike and Carl to research a book she wants to pen.

3.title: Sex and Death
3.plot: Molly has a "mind blowing" experience when she visits Victoria's workplace, a funeral home. Meanwhile, Mike sneaks a peek at Molly's racy writing when she's out of the house.

4.title: Careful What You Dig For
4.plot: Molly meets her literary idol, J.C. Small, a cynic who advises her to write about things in her life that she wouldn't want people to know. Meanwhile, Mike invites his mother over for dinner in an effort to cheer her up.

5.title: Poker in the Front, Looker in the Back
5.plot: Molly believes her suspicious next-door neighbor is up to no good and recruits Joyce to help her spy on him. Meanwhile, the guys get together for a poker game and end up sharing their dreams and aspirations.

6.title: Shoeless Molly Flynn
6.plot: Molly needs to adjust her spending habits on shoes if she wants to maintain harmony in her marriage with Mike.

7.title: They Shoot Asses, Don't They?
7.plot: After being shot during a robbery, Mike decides he needs to live every day like it's his last. As a result, he tells Carl it's time for him to quit the police force.

8.title: What Molly Hath Wrought
8.plot: Molly decides to take a break from writing her novel and accepts a job as a forklift driver at Vince's warehouse...with mixed results.

9.title: Mike & Molly's Excellent Adventure
9.plot: Molly is determined to get Mike out of his routine and encourages him to embrace anything they want in life. They try new things together, until reality sets in and it's time to pay the bill.

10.title: Weekend at Peggy's
10.plot: Following a dramatic argument with Joyce over money, Mike and Molly move into Mike's childhood room at Peggy's.

11.title: Dips & Salsa
11.plot: Mike asks Carl to replace him as Molly's dance partner at a salsa class, but gets jealous when he realizes they're having way too much fun.

12.title: Mind Over Molly
12.plot: Molly grudgingly goes to a therapist (guest star JOHN MICHAEL HIGGINS) at Mike's urging.

13.title: Open Mike Night
13.plot: A confident Molly offers her wisdom to Samuel who now wants to be a standup comic. Meanwhile, Molly's advice to Harry causes him to challenge his protective mother.

14.title: Rich Man, Poor Girl
14.plot: Victoria brings home a new boyfriend, James (guest star MATHER ZICKEL) and the entire family wonders if he's finally "the one."

15.title: Three Girls and an Urn
15.plot: Molly meets the best buddy of her dreams when Peggy's childhood friend, Kay McKinnon (guest star KATHY BATES) comes to town, but Peggy is not keen on sharing.

16.title: The Dice Lady Cometh
16.plot: Molly looks to win some extra cash when she and the girls head to a riverboat casino for the weekend. Meanwhile, Mike and Vince try to enjoy some college basketball when the guys come over to watch TV.

17.title: McMillan and Mom
17.plot: Mike, Samuel and Carl go on a road trip to Memphis to meet Carl's mother.

18.title: Mike's Manifold Destiny
18.plot: When Mike's car breaks down, he must decide if he should accept a loan from Carl to fix it.

19.title: Who's Afraid of J.C. Small
19.plot: Mike and Carl arrest Molly's literary hero, J.C. Small (SUSAN SARANDON), for driving under the influence.

20.title: Sex, Lies and Helicopters
20.plot: Molly catches Carl coming out of Victoria's room late at night, leaving her questioning whether or not she will tell Mike.

21.title: This Old Peggy
21.plot: Mike wants Peggy to see a doctor after her bathtub falls through the ceiling.

22.title: Eight Is Enough
22.plot: On the fourth season finale, Molly gets accepted into an elite eight-week writers' workshop in Iowa, but faces a big decision when Mike asks her not to go.

1.title: The Book of Molly
1.plot: In the fifth season premiere, Molly (MELISSA McCARTHY) returns home after eight weeks at a writers' workshop with great news: she's getting published and scored a big book advance.

2.title: To Have and Withhold
2.plot: Molly has writer's block...and she might lose her big advance if she doesn't cure it fast.

3.title: Tis the Season to Be Molly
3.plot: Mike assures Molly he'll be home in time for Christmas Eve dinner...until he and Carl end up in the back of a stolen truck. Meanwhile, Molly is upset with Vince for trying to change the family's Christmas traditions.

4.title: Gone Cheatin
4.plot: Mike and the guys go on their annual fishing trip except this time it's a little different. Victoria has a secret that she finds hard to keep.

5.title: Molly's Neverending Story
5.plot: Molly's work on numerous drafts of her book begins to annoy Mike and the family.

6.title: The Last Temptation of Mike
6.plot: Mike engages in a little innocent flirting with a rookie policewoman and then feels guilty when she reciprocates.

7.title: Support Your Local Samuel
7.plot: A letter from his financially strapped parents in Africa leaves Samuel contemplating a return to his homeland.

8.title: Mike Check
8.plot: Molly urges Mike to go to the doctor when she learns that he hasn't been in over a decade. The 100th episode was directed by series star Melissa McCarthy.

9.title: Hack to the Future
9.plot: Molly runs into a roadblock in the form of her publisher who wants her to make a provocative rewrite in a section of her book.

10.title: Checkpoint Joyce
10.plot: When Joyce refuses to take a breathalyzer test at a DUI checkpoint, Mike is forced to arrest her.

11.title: Immaculate Deception
11.plot: The prospect of an empty house for the weekend has Mike and Molly in a state of excitement.

12.title: The World According to Peggy
12.plot: Molly plans a party for Peggy after hearing that she's suddenly retiring.

13.title: Buy the Book
13.plot: Molly is excited when her book becomes available for purchase but fears no one will buy it.

14.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Peggy
14.plot: Peggy shares tantalizing stories from her past for Molly's second book.

15.title: Pie Fight
15.plot: When Mike reaches a weight-loss goal he decides to celebrate by indulging in a slice of pie.

16.title: Cocktails and Calamine
16.plot: Molly is nervous about Mike attending a celebratory party her publisher is throwing for her and Peggy. And Mike's feelings are hurt when she doesn't want him to go.

17.title: Mudlick or Bust
17.plot: Molly arranges a surprise reunion between Peggy and her estranged sister.

18.title: No Kay Morale
18.plot: Peggy is thrilled when Kay comes back to town; Molly looks for a way to lift Kay's spirits.

19.title: Mother from Another Mudlick
19.plot: For the first time, Mike meets his aunt Rosemary and is smitten with her positive attitude.

20.title: Fight to the Finish
20.plot: Molly gets angry when Mike won't listen to her vent about writing with Peggy.

21.title: Near Death Do Us Part
21.plot: A near-death experience on the job inspires Carl to propose to Victoria.

22.title: The Bitter Man and the Sea
22.plot: Mike and Molly must rescind Carl's invitation to their anniversary cruise.

imdb.plot outline: Mike, a Chicago police officer, meets fourth-grade teacher Molly one day when he speaks at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting and they fall in love, thanks in part to their mutual love of pie and the desire to resist it. Both face challenges in their quest to lose weight -- Molly from her slender sister and mother and Mike at the diner where he frequently eats. But having found each other, they will support each other as they try to achieve their goals, be it weight loss or Molly's decision to quit teaching and pursue her dream as a writer.
imdb.title: Mike & Molly
plot: A couple meets at an Overeaters' Anonymous meeting.

Mike, a Chicago police officer, meets fourth-grade teacher Molly one day when he speaks at an Overeaters Anonymous meeting and they fall in love, thanks in part to their mutual love of pie and the desire to resist it. Both face challenges in their quest to lose weight -- Molly from her slender sister and mother and Mike at the diner where he frequently eats. But having found each other, they will support each other as they try to achieve their goals, be it weight loss or Molly's decision to quit teaching and pursue her dream as a writer.::Jwelch5742
synopsis: ME & MY HUSBAND WERE JUST WATCHIN THIS SHOW CALLED "MIKE & MOLLY" ... NOW WHO THE HECK DO YOU COMPLAIN TOO OR WRITE TOO ... THERE IS A SCENE WHERE THE MOTHER IN LAW MAKES A COMMENT "HAVE YOU'VE BEEN EVER IN ARIZONA ... IT'S A FURNACE OF DRUKEN INDIANS" ... NOW TELL ME IF THAT IS A BIGOTRY AT ITS FINEST? ... SHARE & COMMENT PLEASE ... NOT TOO PLEASE WITH CBS .... NOT TO PLEASED WITH THIS AWEFUL COMMENT ... WE ARE FIRST NATION PEOPLE ... WE ARE VERY DISAPPOINTED ... WE THINK THE WRITERS OF THIS SHOW NEED TO APOLOGIZE TO MY PEOPLE FOR THEIR IGNORANCE

camera: Sony CineAlta F23, Panavision Primo Lenses
